1.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's, Monica and Rachel are hosting a New Year's party. So theNEWLINEplace is crowded and in a shameless promotion for NBC they're watching Jay Leno's coverageNEWLINEof New Year's from Time Square.

lines.Line: (On TV to Dick Clark) Is there any entertainment there? What are peopleNEWLINEdoing
All right! Here we go! 1999! The year of Joey
All right! Here we go! 1999! The year of Joey
(deadpan, standing next to Monica) We're very happy for you
We wanted to kiss at midnight, but nobody else is going to soNEWLINEy'know
All right, I'll take care of it
All right, I'll take care of it
All right, I'll take care of it

lines.Character: (They try to stop him, not sure of what he's planning. He ignores them and goes to talkNEWLINEto Ross
lines.Line: They try to stop him, not sure of what he's planning. He ignores them and goes to talkNEWLINEto Ross.

Well, who's gonna kiss my sister

It's so obvious, why doesn't he just ask
It's so obvious, why doesn't he just ask

2.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Ross is talking to a beautiful woman as Chandler and Joey enter.

lines.Line: Okay! (She leaves.) (To Chandler and Joey.) Hey
I just asked that girl out
I just asked that girl out
Nice!! Yeah! Is that part of your resolution, your new thing for today
Yes it is. See. (Shows them the piece of paper she gave him with her nameNEWLINEand phone number on it.
You all right Chandler? Is there something funny about that name
No. No, I just think that maybe I-I'd heard it somewhere before. (SitsNEWLINEdown rubbing his temple.
Oh really! Where? Somewhere funny I'd bet! (Chandler is straining to keepNEWLINEquiet as Phoebe enters.
Oh-oh, guess what? I-I have a date with Elizabeth (Talking into Chandler'sNEWLINEear.) Hornswoggle
Hornswoggle? (To Chandler) Ooh, this must be killing you
Hornswoggle? (To Chandler) Ooh, this must be killing you
See ya! All right Pheebs, I am ready for my first lesson.
Okay. (Joey tries to take the guitar.) Oh no-no-no, you don't touch theNEWLINEguitar! First you learn here, (Points to her head.) then you learn here. (Points to theNEWLINEguitar.

Okay, lesson one: chords. Now, I don't know the actual names of theNEWLINEchords but umm, I-I-I made up names for the way my hand looks while I'm doing them. (SheNEWLINEstarts to show Joey the chords. Transcribers Note: For this one you'll have to use yourNEWLINEimagination, 'cause it would take me 50 pages to describe each one. So if you want to seeNEWLINEthem, you'll have to wait for this episode to come to a TV near you.) (Holding up her handNEWLINEand then reconfiguring her hand with each name.) So then, this is Bear Claw. Okay, umm,NEWLINETurkey Leg and Old Lady. (Joey tries to imitate them.
What an interesting approach to guitar instruction. Y'know some mightNEWLINEfind it amusing, I myself find it regular

3.SceneDescription: Elizabeth Hornswoggle's apartment; Ross is there on his date with her. They areNEWLINEsitting on the couch watching a movie. Ross is obviously hot.

lines.Line: (talking to himself) My God! These pants are burning up! (He's stillNEWLINEwearing the leather pants.) (She snuggles closer.) Oh come on, she wants to snuggle now!NEWLINEWhat is she trying to kill me? It's like a volcano in here! (Out loud.) Are you hot?
Okay, it must just be me then

lines.Character: (He shifts on the couch and a ripping sound emanates from his lower regions, the soundNEWLINEreminds one of a brief explosion of gas. In other words, it sounds like he farted. She hasNEWLINEa look of horrific wonderment, wondering Did he just fart
lines.Line: He shifts on the couch and a ripping sound emanates from his lower regions, the soundNEWLINEreminds one of a brief explosion of gas. In other words, it sounds like he farted. She hasNEWLINEa look of horrific wonderment, wondering Did he just fart?
That was just the pants on the couch. Umm, hey, do you, do you mind if INEWLINEuse your bathroom
Thanks. (Gets up and as he does so, the sound returns. Without anotherNEWLINEword he heads into her bathroom.

lines.Character: [Cut to Elizabeth Hornswoggle's bathroom, Ross frantically pulls his shirt out andNEWLINEdrops his pants. He exhales in sheer ecstasy as the coolness of the bathroom envelops hisNEWLINElegs. He sits on the cast iron bathtub, again gasping in pleasure. He next grabs aNEWLINEmagazine and starts to blow air on his exposed legs, but that doesn't work the way heNEWLINEwants it to. So he throws the magazine down, looks around for another idea, and finds one.NEWLINEHe jumps up and hops to the sink. lines.Character: (He goes to pull up his pants, but can't seem to get them past his knees. HeNEWLINEfrantically tries to pull them up to no avail. Panic sets in

4.SceneDescription: Chandler, Joey, and Ross's, The phone rings and Joey answers it.

lines.Line: (calling from Elizabeth's bathroom) Joey, it's Ross! I need some help

No, I-I got really hot in my leather pants so I took them off but theyNEWLINEmust have shrunk from the-the sweat or-or-or my legs expanded from the heat. Look, I-INEWLINEcan't put them back on. I can't
Oh. That is quite a situation. Uh, do you see any like, powder
Powder! Yeah! Yeah, I have powder! (Grabs some of her shelf.)
Powder! Yeah! Yeah, I have powder! (Grabs some of her shelf.)
Good-good, okay, sprinkle some of that on your legs, it'll absorb some ofNEWLINEthe moisture and then you can get your pants back up

Yeah, okay, hold on! (He puts the phone down and proceeds to spread aNEWLINElarge amount of powder on his legs and makes another attempt at pulling up his pants. ItNEWLINEdoesn't work, and without picking up the phone leans down to it.) (Almost in tears.)NEWLINEThey're not coming on man
Ohh, I-I see lotion, I have lotion! Will that work
Yeah, sure, spread some of that on there
Yeah, sure, spread some of that on there

lines.Character: (Ross proceeds to apply copious amounts of the lotion on his legs. He literally startsNEWLINEspraying the back of his legs with the lotion, and as he applies some to his butt he makesNEWLINEa happy face like he enjoyed that sensation. After using about half the bottle he againNEWLINEtries to pull up his pants, but at the first sign of resistance, his hand slips off of theNEWLINEpants and hits him in the forehead

Really?! Uhh, what color is it
Well, I'm just—if the paste matches the pants, you can make yourselfNEWLINEa pair of paste pants and she won't know the difference
(entering) Joey, do you have a minute
(entering) Joey, do you have a minute
(entering) Joey, do you have a minute
(To Ross) Uh, Rachel's here, so good luck man, let me know how it worksNEWLINEout. (He hangs up the phone and strands Ross in the bathroom.
Oh, Joey, I have such a problem
Oh, Joey, I have such a problem
Oh well, you're timing couldn't be better. I am putting out fires all overNEWLINEthe place
Okay. Okay. Okay. Joey, I have got to tell you something
Okay. Okay. Okay. Joey, I have got to tell you something
What-what is it, what is it
What-what is it, what is it
Oh my God, it's so huge, but you just have to promise me that you cannotNEWLINEtell anyone
Oh no, no-no-no-no! I don't want to know
Oh no, no-no-no-no! I don't want to know
Yes! Yes! Yes, you do want to know! This is unbelievable
I don't care, Rach! Look, I am tired of being the guy who knows all theNEWLINEsecrets but can't tell anyone

What? What secrets? You know secrets? What are they
What? What secrets? You know secrets? What are they
And you're not supposed to be gossiping!!

I know, I know! I just can't keep this one in, so I pick up theNEWLINEphone… (Joey in a childish attempt to not hear what Rachel is about to say, puts hisNEWLINEfingers in his ears and starts to scream loudly. Rachel turns and walks out upon seeingNEWLINEthat Joey's not gonna listen, and as she exits Chandler walks in and sees Joey in hisNEWLINEcurrent state.

lines.Character: (Chandler seeing that Joey has his eyes closed sneaks over and picks up the chicken.NEWLINEThe chicken starts flapping it's wings in protest as Chandler holds the chicken inchesNEWLINEfrom Joey's face. 5.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Joey is there to apologize to Phoebe.

lines.Line: No, I can't talk to you! I don't have a fancy ad in the Yellow Pages

Look, Pheebs, I just, I wanna apologize for, for saying that your methodNEWLINEwas stupid and-and maybe ask you to be my teacher again. And-and I promise, I won't touchNEWLINEa guitar until you say I'm ready. (After a short pause she hands him her guitar.) YouNEWLINEreally think I'm ready

Wow! Cool! (He takes the guitar, stands up, and goes to play a note.NEWLINEHowever, while strumming it, he knocks it out of his hands and it bounces off the tableNEWLINEand lands on the floor. Phoebe just stares at the guitar.
(sitting back down) Was the chord at least right

lines.Line: (entering) Oh good, okay, I can't take it anymore. I can't take itNEWLINEanymore. So you win, okay? Here! (Hands him the 50 bucks he's about to owe him.) Pheebs?NEWLINEFlying a jet?
